title: uLLam urugiyE
sahitya:
uLLam urugiyE krpai koLLumaiyE murugA eLLaLa vENumE EzhaiyEniDamuDanE


anupallavi

  aLLI aLLik-koDai aLittaDiyAr uyyavE Adarittu aruLum nAthanAgum nI


caraNam    tIya vinaiyinAl mEvum tIngellAm nIngavE tAyenap-pAnguDan tAngum gAngEyanE
sEyat-tAi adanai nEyamODu aNaivALE nIyumadu pOlen sahAyanAi udava
